summary_detail.value: A public meeting for Hill County has been set for 4p.m. on Monday, September 4th at the Havre High School. Public meetings will be announced soon for Blaine County and the Chipewwa Cree Tribe - stay tuned for that information.These meeting are facilitated by the Incident Management Team to help the local jurisdiction share information with area residents. Members of the Incident Management Team will give an update on the current situation of the fire, and expected suppression activities over the next few days. County representatives will be on hand to talk about the fire from their perspectives and about plans for the

title: Public Meetings (East Fork Fire Wildfire)
